Features.Feature: Whilst standing raise your arm above your head to walk through the township (great for kids) or view local stories
Stand and raise your arm above your head to get back to the main menu

These images were taken at the Caen site in November 2012 when this project was begun. They document the initial surveying of the site to map the outlines of the original longhouses. The geography of the model is taken from this survey. The red flags were used to mark the corners of the buildings. This process pre-dates the excavation of the summer of 2013.
